Name: ECS MONITORING CHECK
checklistText:
<size=21>ECS Monitoring Check</size>

Panel 2:
	SUIT COMP ΔP 					- -1.0 to -3.5 in. H2O
	O2 FLOW ind					- 0.2-0.45 lb/hr
	O2 PRESS IND sw				- SURGE TK
		O2 SURGE TANK PRESS 		- 865-935 psia
	O2 PRESS IND sw				- TK 1
Panel 602	
	REPRESS O2 PRESS ind			- >865 psia
Panel 2:	
	ECS RAD tb						- gray
	
	*If PRIM RAD tb - 2			*
	*	ECS RAD FLOW AUTO CONT - 1 until*
	*		tb gray, then AUTO	*

	ECS IND sel						- PRIM
		RAD PRIM IN TEMP ind		- 67°-97°F
		RAD PRIM OUT TEMP ind		- -20° to 63°F
			(-20° to 97°F for lunar orb)
		PRIM GLY EVAP OUT TEMP 	- 38°-50.5°F
		PRIM GLY EVAP STM PRESS ind
			When boiling 			- 0.09-0.14 psia
			Not boiling 			- >0.14 psia
		PRIM GLY DISCH PRESS 		- 40-52 psig
	SUIT TEMP ind
		Without evap				- 45°-70°F
		With evap					- 45°-55°F
	CAB TEMO ind					- 70°-80°F
	SUIT PRESS						- = CAB PRESS ind
	CABIN PRESS 					- 4.7-5.3 psia
	CO2 PP ind						- <7.6 mm Hg
	SUIT COMP ΔP ind				- 0.3-0.4 psid
	PRIM ACCUM QTY ind				- 30-65%
	If qty <30%
Panel 379, 2:	
		PRIM ACCUM FILL vlv		- ON until 40-55% is reached
Panel 2:
	H20 QTY IND sw					- POT
		POT H2O QTY 				- 10-100%
	H20 QTY IND sw					- WASTE
		WASTE H2O QTY 				- 25-85%
			If > 85% 				- WASTE WATER TANK DRAIN CHECK
